response.original_title: Pinkalicious And Peterrific: Playtime With Pinkalicious!
response.overview: It's time for fun and games with Pinkalicious! Join Pinkalicious and her brother Peter as they put their gnome thinking caps on to help Norman the Gnome plan the perfect playdate. Then, Pinkalicious and her friends have fun playing with their dolls. But when one of the dolls get hurt, the game changes to playing doctor!
response.title: Pinkalicious And Peterrific: Playtime With Pinkalicious!
